mapper.insert: insert into book(isbn, title, intro, author, publisher, imgsrc, btno) values (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{imgsrc}, #{booktype.no})
mapper.select: select *, count(isbn) as cnt from book left join bookType using(btno) group by isbn
mapper.update: update bookDetail set exist = 0 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select isbn from book left join bookDetail using(isbn) order by bno desc limit 0, 1

select *, (enddate is null and startdate is not null) loanAvail, DATE_ADD(startdate, interval 14 DAY) mayEndDate from book left join bookType using(btno) left join bookDetail using(isbn) left join loan using(bno) where isbn = #{isbn} and enddate is null order by bno desc
select isbn, imgsrc from book left join bookType using(btno) where title = #{title} and author = #{author} and publisher = #{publisher} and btno = #{booktype.no}
select type from bookType where btno = #{btno}
select bno from book A left join bookDetail B using(isbn) where isbn = #{isbn}
